taxonomicnotes: A number of different spotted Barbus species have historically been misidentified as Barbus lineomaculatus. Until a thorough check has been made of the museum collections on which the distribution map is based, it must be recognised that the map contains inaccuracies.
rationale: This species has a wide distribution, with no known major widespread threats. It is therefore listed as Least Concern. It has also been assessed regionally as Least Concern for central, east, north, northeast, south and west Africa.
assessor: Bills, R., Hanssens, M., Kazembe, J., Marshall, B., Moelants, T., Ntakimazi, G. & Tweddle, D.
evaluator: Snoeks, J., Tweddle, D., Getahun, A., Lalèyè, P., Paugy, D., Zaiss, R., Fishar, M.R.A & Brooks, E.
